channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle -- MySQL Cluster
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle -- MySQL Cluster

item.title: CVE-2017-3321|2024-08-05T14:23:34.309Z -- oracle -- mysql%20cluster
item.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Cluster component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Cluster: General). Supported versions that are affected are 7.2.19 and earlier, 7.3.8 and earlier and 7.4.5 and earlier. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Cluster. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of MySQL Cluster. CVSS v3.0 Base Score 3.7 (Availability impacts).

item.title: CVE-2017-3322|2024-08-05T14:23:34.238Z -- oracle -- mysql%20cluster
item.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Cluster component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Cluster: NDBAPI). Supported versions that are affected are 7.2.25 and earlier, 7.3.14 and earlier, 7.4.12 and earlier and . Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Cluster. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of MySQL Cluster. CVSS v3.0 Base Score 3.7 (Availability impacts).
